--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Vampirtron:
> 
>      "AHHHHHH!!!!" Vampitron yelled as he hit the atmosphere of the 
prehistoric planet. He small ship crashed into the planet's surface 
and slid fifty feet. When the dust settled, the ship's top opened. A 
transformer walked out. He had no beast mode. A lone black wolf walked 
up to him, the robot grabbed it by the nap of it's neck and looked it 
over, "A suitable beast mode," He said. He pulled a needle from a 
small pack in his ship and stuck the wolf. He then dropped the wolf 
who ran away, obviously terrified. Vampirtron opened his chest and 
screwed the vial of blood into his systems. It was gone in a second. 
Vampitron unscrewed the vial and tossed it to the ground. He took two 
steps from his ship and underwent the changes.
> 
>      An hour later he awoke, in beast mode. He transformed back to 
robot mode, and opened a comm. Unfortunatly it only could reach about 
one hundred miles, so he may not meet anyone. He sent out this 
message.
> 
>      "Hello to any transformers out there," He said into the comm, 
very calmly. "My name is Vampirtron, I have crashed onto this planet 
and I request assistance from the nearest base. In return for help I 
will give you my ship."
> 
>      He found a big rock and sat down on it.
> 
>  
> 
> OOC: He's in the Rocky Mountians just to let you know.
> 
>
